grid

Class Cursor<T extends Tile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • grid.Cursor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - the type of the elements in the matrix this is choosing from.

    public class Cursor<T extends Tile>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract cursor implementation that is able to select things in any grid
